synopsis.text: From the bustling halls of a high school emerges the petite yet feisty Iroe Genma, a third-year student affectionately known as 'Elder Sister' despite her diminutive stature. As the head of the Model Club, she leads a trio of schoolgirls in constructing intricate plastic models, ranging from automobiles and boats to robots. Joined by the calm and collected Makina 'Makimaki' Sakamaki and the fiery Hazuki 'Okappa' Okamoto, this eclectic group strives to fulfill their club obligations amidst a whirlwind of chaotic distractions. From internal squabbles to impromptu lessons on love confessions, these three friends find themselves entangled in a series of absurd and hilarious predicaments that promise to keep viewers entertained.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
